title: Add city routes and fare data from competitor research

requirements.text: Research and add real city pairs and fare data by comparing with major transport booking sites (e.g., RedBus, MakeMyTrip, Goibibo). Include popular routes within India covering train, bus, and taxi options.

quotes: add cities and its fare by comparing other site on internet

acceptanceCriteria: At least 20-30 city pairs are added covering major Indian cities (e.g., Delhi-Mumbai, Bangalore-Chennai, Kolkata-Hyderabad)
Fare prices are realistic and competitive based on current market rates from competitor sites
Multiple transport modes (train, bus, taxi) are available for popular routes
Each route includes operator name, departure time, arrival time, duration, and pricing that matches industry standards

requirements.text: Update the backend Route type and data initialization in main.mo to include the new city pairs and fare data with realistic schedules and pricing
acceptanceCriteria: Routes are added to the backend's stable state during initialization
Each route has complete information: origin, destination, transportType, operator, departureTime, arrivalTime, price, availableSeats/vehicles

requirements.text: Ensure the search functionality on the frontend properly displays the new city routes and allows users to search by the newly added city pairs
acceptanceCriteria: Search results page shows the new routes when users search for the added city pairs
Filter and sort functionality works correctly with the expanded route data
Route cards display accurate fare information matching the backend data

constraints: Use real city names and realistic fare ranges based on competitor research
Maintain existing Route data structure in backend/main.mo
Do not modify the search or results page UI components beyond necessary data display updates
nonGoals: Integration with live pricing APIs or external booking systems
Dynamic pricing based on demand or availability
Automated web scraping or real-time fare updates
Adding new cities beyond the initial research set
